MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK8 postcode area of Stirling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:10pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repair work required on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:20pm on 21st January 2021.
